about.subtitle: Our Philosophy
about.title: Straightforward & Reliable Financial Support
paragraphs: MAAGA LTD exists to make financial work clear, disciplined, and manageable. We help clients stay organised and well-prepared, whether they operate in the United Kingdom, the United States, or both.
We respect your time. We provide calm, steady support and ensure your financial responsibilities are handled with care, allowing you to focus on what matters most to you.
about.quote: We chose to build a service that brings everything back to clarity.

teamSection.subtitle: Meet The Team
teamSection.title: Our Team
teamSection.description: Dedicated professionals committed to delivering exceptional financial support and service.

valueProposition.subtitle: Who We Serve
valueProposition.title: Designed for
valueProposition.description: We support business owners, busy professionals, and individuals who value clarity and order in their financial affairs.

team.name: Priya Joshua
team.bio: Priya holds an MSc in International Banking and Finance and is a qualified Company Secretary. She has extensive experience working across the US, UK, and UAE, including roles in retail, startups, and AI SaaS businesses. Currently, she serves as a Finance Manager for an AI technology company in Oxford, where she manages everything from bookkeeping and management accounting to financial reporting and business advisory. Priya's diverse background blends strategic financial skills with sector-specific insights, making her highly effective in fast-paced, innovative environments.
team.qualifications: MSc International Banking & Finance, Company Secretary

team.name: Danny
team.bio: Danny is a highly skilled tax and finance professional with an MSc in Accounting and Finance, an MBA, and advanced certifications in Xero, QuickBooks, and Alteryx. With over a decade of experience at PwC, KPMG, EY, Deloitte, and Thomson Reuters, he stands out for expertly managing complex UK and international tax compliance. Danny's strength lies in leading high-performing teams, delivering precise results through automation, and providing clients with reliable guidance in a changing regulatory landscape—making him an indispensable asset to any organization.
team.qualifications: MSc Accounting & Finance, MBA, Xero, QuickBooks, Alteryx

team.name: Beula
team.bio: Beula is an accomplished HR leader, recognized for her expertise in people management and her warm, personal approach. With experience at leading global companies including LinkedIn, Franklin Templeton, and Hewlett Packard Enterprise, she excels at attracting and developing top talent, building strong, high-performing teams, and ensuring every employee feels supported and valued. Beula's human-focused management style turns every HR interaction into a positive experience—making her a trusted partner for both businesses and their people.

services.title: Tax-Filing Preparation
services.description: We manage the preparation and organisation of tax documents with precision.

services.title: Bookkeeping Support
services.description: We maintain clean, structured, and timely financial records.

services.title: Operational Management
services.description: Structured oversight for holding companies that keeps things orderly.

storySlides.title: Beginning with Clarity
storySlides.content: MAAGA LTD was formed to remove stress from financial administration and present information simply and accurately.

storySlides.title: Cross-Border Confidence
storySlides.content: We support clients navigating both UK and US systems, providing structure and clarity across two financial environments.

storySlides.title: A Smooth and Respectful Process
storySlides.content: Our communication is calm, direct, and easy to follow. We explain matters clearly and avoid unnecessary complexity.

storySlides.title: Supporting the Busy Professional
storySlides.content: We understand the demands on business owners and individuals. Our services keep financial responsibilities under control.

storySlides.title: Stability for Holding Companies
storySlides.content: We provide routine oversight and administrative order, allowing operations to run smoothly in the background.

storySlides.title: Precision You Can Trust
storySlides.content: Every figure, document, and record is handled with discipline, integrity, and attention to detail.

testimonials.quote: MAAGA LTD brought structure to our finances and made our yearly filings straightforward. The peace of mind is invaluable.
testimonials.author: Sarah Jenkins

testimonials.quote: Professional, organised, and remarkably clear. A dependable partner for my cross-border consulting requirements.
testimonials.author: James Thorne

testimonials.quote: We needed stability for our holding company operations. They delivered exactly that with quiet efficiency.
testimonials.author: David Alistair
